subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: As usual, a lot of the games have gone down to the buzzer. But this year, an unusually high number of them have produced moments when coaches and fans ask, “What was he thinking?”
snippet: As usual, a lot of the games have gone down to the buzzer. But this year, an unusually high number of them have produced moments when coaches and fans ask, “What was he thinking?”
